text: Brad Hibbs Wyman (born May 13, 1963 in Los Angeles, California) is an American film producer, best known for producing Monster. His first film was White of the Eye, and later worked on Freeway, Trees Lounge, The Dark Backward, The Chase, and Barb Wire. He lives in Los Angeles, California. ==Filmography== All films, he was producer unless otherwise noted. ===Film=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! style="background:#B0C4DE;" | Year ! style="background:#B0C4DE;" | Film !
